prompt: Build a comprehensive dashboard with bottom navigation bar featuring five tabs (Home, Analytics, Reports, Settings, Profile). Display vibrant purple-to-pink gradient background with compact header containing user avatar, name, and quick action buttons. Show three horizontal metric cards with icons, values, percentage changes, and up/down trend arrows. Add chart placeholder area and quick actions grid with six circular buttons for common tasks like 'Add User', 'Generate Report', 'View Analytics', 'Backup Data', 'Security', and 'Help'.
